definition[0]: an animal that looks like a large mouse with a long tail
definition[1]: someone who has been disloyal to you or deceived you
example[0]: But you promised to help us, you rat!
definition[2]: if someone rats on you, they tell someone in authority about something wrong that you have done
example[1]: They’ll kill you if they find out you’ve ratted on them!
definition[3]: to not do what you had promised to do
example[2]: He accused the government of ratting on its promises to the disabled.
